modName: Skyrim - Final Fantasy VII Zack Fair Save Game
summary: Zack Fair Save File For Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
Requires:
SKSE
Cloud\'s Buster Sword
ZackFF7Clothes&Hair
Alternate Start: Live Another Life

Zack is standing in the room you start in on Live Another Life. Be Sure to activate the Shrine of Mara to choose your Life, otherwise it is set for Random.

Hope you have fun with this, may update it later depending on the mods i get in the near future to make it better.

Happy Gaming Everyone.

NOTE: This will be part of a set of Save Games, and in the future, an NPC Follower.
author: johna94
